tpeg_message.summary: A3216 London - A3216 Sloane Street in Chelsea closed northbound from the Sloane Square junction to Scotch Corner, because of a mobile crane being used.

A400 London - A400 Charing Cross Road in Westminster closed northbound from Trafalgar Square to the St Martin-in-the-Fields junction, because of gas main work. Expect delays. Diversion in operation - via the Strand, Kingsway, High Holborn and Shaftesbury Avenue.
A244 Surrey - A244 Chertsey Road in Feltham closed in both directions between the Groveley Road junction and the Phoenix Court junction, because of junction improvements.
A4094 Buckinghamshire - A4094 Cookham Bridge in Cookham closed in both directions between the Hedsor Road junction and the B4447 High Street junction, because of roadworks.
A4200 London - A4200 Eversholt Street in Camden closed southbound from the A400 Oakley Square junction to the Euston Station junction, because of water main work.

A306 London - A306 Hammersmith Bridge in Hammersmith closed in both directions between the Hammersmith Flyover junction and the Castlenau junction, because of long-term roadworks. Diversion in operation - Buses 33, 72, 209, 419, 485 and 609 are curtailed to Lonsdale Road (south of the bridge). All other traffic uses Putney, Chiswick and Kew bridges.
A246 Surrey - A246 York Road in Guildford closed in both directions from the Victoria Road junction to the Denmark Road junction, because of gas main work.
A3214 London - A3214 Buckingham Gate in Central London closed in both directions between the Spur Road junction and the Palace Street junction, because of roadworks.
A40 London - A40 High Holborn in Central London closed eastbound between the New Turnstile junction and the Little Turnstile junction, because of roadworks.

A118 London - A118 Romford Road in Forest Gate closed in both directions between the Ratcliff Road junction and the Palmerston Road junction, because of a fire at the Police Station earlier. Traffic is coping well.

A3214 London - A3214 Buckingham Palace Road in Victoria closed northbound from the Elizabeth Street junction to the A3213 Eccleston Bridge junction, because of water main work. Diversion in operation - for buses 11, 44, 170, 211, C1 and C10.

A104 London - A104 Lea Bridge Road in Leyton closed and queues in both directions between the Flempton Road junction and the Perth Road junction, because of accident investigation work. Congestion to half a mile back along Lea Bridge Road westbound, and south on Markhouse Road from Walthamstow. Diversion in operation - for buses 55 and 56.
M25 London - M25 lane closed on entry slip road anticlockwise at J28, A12 (Brentwood), because of long-term roadworks. Expect delays.
M25 Surrey - Narrow lanes on M25 in both directions around J10, A3 (Wisley Interchange), because of long-term roadworks. Expect delays.
M11 Essex - An earlier accident on the exit slip road to the M25 anticlockwise on M11 southbound at J6 M25. Traffic is coping well.
